comments.body: iirc the height is supposed to be some multiple of the width of the device, no?

Yes, I think you're correct. The figure on the right side of the "Detail View" section of 
https://www.google.com/design/spec/layout/metrics-keylines.html#metrics-keylines-keylines-spacing says that the size of the area below the toolbar/statusbar should have an aspect ration of 3:2.  The current API really needs a fixed appBar height. I'll file an issue for this.
I think it's Floating Action Button
